name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: The Essence of Music
description: Exploring the fundamental elements that define music as an art form.

lessons.name: Music Theory Basics
lessons.description: An introduction to scales, chords, and melodies.

lessons.name: History of Music
lessons.description: A survey of music history from classical to contemporary styles.

lessons.name: Genres and Styles
lessons.description: Exploring different genres of music and their stylistic elements.

name: Lyrics and Songwriting
description: A deep dive into the craft of lyricism and the process of songwriting.

lessons.name: The Art of Lyric Writing
lessons.description: Techniques and tips for writing compelling lyrics.

lessons.name: Song Structure
lessons.description: Understanding the common structures of songs in various genres.

lessons.name: Creative Process in Songwriting
lessons.description: Developing a workflow for creativity and expression in songwriting.

name: Music Production Techniques
description: Understanding the technical aspects of music production and sound engineering.

lessons.name: Recording Techniques
lessons.description: Fundamentals of capturing sound, from microphones to digital recording.

lessons.name: Mixing and Mastering
lessons.description: The process of refining and finalizing a musical piece for distribution.

lessons.name: Electronic Music Production
lessons.description: Techniques specific to producing electronic music and beat making.
